page.title: 08Mobile shops - Onecote
page.content: Onecote has no shops but several mobile shops visit the village. Every Friday the butcher's van comes to Onecote from Butterton. It arrives at about 4 o'clock and delivers to most houses and farms in turn. It sells all kinds of meat and poultry and also sells cans of pop. The grocer's van visits Onecote on a Tuesday afternoon at about 4.30p.m. It goes to each house or farm in turn and sells fresh fruit and vegetables, as well as canned food and drinks. The milkman delivers milk to Onecote every day at about 7.30a.m. He calls at most houses selling milk, cheese, yoghurt, eggs and cream. The library van from Cheadle visits Onecote every other Monday at about 4.30p.m. It stays for half an hour on the car park by the Jervis Arms.
